Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.TUI

Class TUIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.TUI.TUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatListener, LocalModelListener, StationListener, TableListener, TurnStateListener, GameHandlingListener, PlayerCreationListener, Listener, SetupListener, StateListener, GeneralListener, UI
public class TUIView extends Object implements UI, GeneralListener
The class manages the Textual User Interface (TUI) of the game.

  • Method Details

    • setLocalModel

      public void setLocalModel(LocalModel localModel)
      Sets the local model of the TUI game.
      Specified by:
      setLocalModel in interface UI
      Parameters:
      localModel - The LocalModel of the current game.

    • printTUIView

      public void printTUIView(String[][] TUIView)
      This method prints to terminal a matrix of strings, each string represents two UTF-8 wide character(s), Making all lines aligned. Make sure to use monospace supported fonts, line Noto Sans Mono + Noto Color Emoji
      Parameters:
      TUIView - the matrix of strings to print

    • goalCardEffectTUIView

      public String[][] goalCardEffectTUIView(GoalCard card)
      Generates a description of a goal card and its effect to display in the TUI.
      Parameters:
      card - The GoalCard to be displayed.
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing the goal card in the TUI.

    • playableCardEffectTUIView

      public String[][] playableCardEffectTUIView(PlayableCard card)
      Generates a description of a PlayableCard for display in the TUI.
      Parameters:
      card - The PlayableCard to be displayed.
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing the PlayableCard.

    • goalEffectView

      public String[][] goalEffectView(PatternEffect patternEffect)
      Generates a description of a goal effect of a goal card to display in the TUI.
      Parameters:
      patternEffect - the effect that will be printed in the TUI.
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing the pattern effect to be printed.

    • goalEffectView

      public String[][] goalEffectView(SymbolEffect symbolEffect)
      Generates a textual representation of the effect of a GoalCard with its symbol effect for display in the user interface. The symbol effect consist of having a required number of symbols that give points to the player.
      Parameters:
      symbolEffect - the symbol effect that will be printed in the TUI
      Returns:
      A matrix of strings representing the symbol effect to be printed.

    • notify

      public void notify(GameHandlingEvents type, List<String> varArgs)
      To notify the view that a Game was created or joined
      Specified by:
      notify in interface GameHandlingListener
      Parameters:
      type - the type of GameHandlingEvents that was received. CREATED_GAME, if the game was created. JOINED_GAMES, if a game was joined. AVAILABLE_GAMES, if the list of available games is updated.
      varArgs - is a list of available information (on the game or on the available games).

      public void notify(LocalModelEvents type, LocalModel localModel, String... varArgs)
      To notify changes related to the local models or the state of new players.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface LocalModelListener
      Parameters:
      type - a LocalModelEvents that express the type of event received.
      localModel - the new updated local model.
      varArgs - an array of strings containing information related to the new update, such as the nickname of the player whose station and state is updated.
